content: I'm really excited about maybe finally getting my archive of Scripting News and DaveNet stuff, dating back to 1994, into ChatGPT before too long. Some people will be surprised I think to find that they're in this archive. If this works it'll be like the index in the back of a huge and very detailed and repetitive memoir, but it will read in the aggregate. That's the beauty and unique feature of this new medium. I know I've tried this before, but this time I think I'll be able to do it myself and fuss over it and learn from it the way I do software development. Converting a very large work of writing into a reference.
